email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I have a vessel available for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. The vessel is the MV Ocean Star, 150,000 DWT, 280m LOA. The laycan is 15-20 October. I can offer a starting freight rate of $52.50 per metric ton. Let me know if this works for you or if you need further details. Best regards, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the offer. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit high for us. We were hoping for something in the low 50s, say $50.75 per metric ton. Also, can you confirm the laytime and demurrage terms? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your response. I can adjust the freight rate to $51.00 per metric ton, which I believe is fair given the current market. Laytime is 72 hours total, and demurrage is set at $20,000 per day pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $51.00 sounds reasonable. However, we would like to cap the demurrage at $18,000 per day. If you can agree to that, we can proceed with the fixture. Please confirm. Best, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I can agree to cap the demurrage at $18,000 per day. Let’s proceed with the fixture at $51.00 per metric ton, laycan 15-20 October, and demurrage at $18,000 per day. I’ll send over the recap shortly. Thanks, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, that works for us. Please send the recap, and we’ll finalize the details. Thanks for your flexibility. Cheers, John.
